verses.t: The fool{H5036} hath said{H559} in his heart{H3820}, There is no God{H430}. They are corrupt{H7843}, they have done abominable{H8581} works{H5949}, there is none that doeth{H6213} good{H2896}.
LordThe {H3068} looked down{H8259} from heaven{H8064} upon the children{H1121} of men{H120}, to see{H7200} if there{H3426} were any that did understand{H7919}, and seek{H1875} God{H430}.
They are all gone aside{H5493}, they are all together{H3162} become filthy{H444}: there is none that doeth{H6213} good{H2896}, no, not one{H259}.filthy: Heb. stinking
Have all the workers{H6466} of iniquity{H205} no knowledge{H3045}? who eat up{H398} my people{H5971} as they eat{H398} bread{H3899}, and call{H7121} Lordnot upon the {H3068}.
There were they in great{H6343} fear{H6342}: for God{H430} is in the generation{H1755} of the righteous{H6662}.were…: Heb. they feared a fear
Ye have shamed{H954} the counsel{H6098} of the poor{H6041}, Lordbecause the {H3068} is his refuge{H4268}.

Oh that{H5414} the salvation{H3444} of Israel{H3478} were come out of Zion{H6726}! Lordwhen the {H3068} bringeth back{H7725} the captivity{H7622} of his people{H5971}, Jacob{H3290} shall rejoice{H1523}, and Israel{H3478} shall be glad{H8055}.Oh…: Heb. Who will give
